summary.para: Gets the HDR metadata describing the display on which the content will be presented.

param.name: pVideoProcessor
param.para: A pointer to the interface.

param.name: pType
param.para: The type of HDR metadata supplied.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the memory referenced by pHDRMetaData.
If pHDRMetaData is NULL, Size should be 0.

param.name: pMetaData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that receives the HDR metadata.
This parameter can be NULL.

remarks.para: This can be called multiple times, the first time to get the Type (in which case Size can be 0 and pHDRMetaData can be NULL) and then again to with non-NULL values to retrieve the actual metadata.

summary.para: Gets the HDR metadata associated with the video stream.

param.name: pVideoProcessor
param.para: A pointer to the interface.

param.name: StreamIndex
param.para: Identifies the input stream.

param.name: pType
param.para: The type of the HDR metadata currently associated with the stream.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the memory referenced by pHDRMetaData.
If pHDRMetaData is NULL, Size should be 0.

param.name: pMetaData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that receives the HDR metadata.
This parameter can be NULL.

remarks.para: This can be called multiple times, the first time to get the Type (in which case Size can be 0 and pHDRMetaData can be NULL) and then again to with non-NULL values to retrieve the actual metadata.

summary.para: Sets the HDR metadata describing the display on which the content will be presented.

param.name: pVideoProcessor
param.para: A pointer to the interface.

param.name: Type
param.para: The type of HDR metadata supplied.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the HDR metadata supplied in pHDRMetaData.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, the size should be 0.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, the size is sizeof(DXGI_HDR_METADATA_HDR10).

param.name: pHDRMetaData
param.para: Pointer to the metadata information.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, this should be NULL.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, this is a pointer to a structure.

remarks.para: When processing an HDR stream, the driver may use this metadata optimize the video for the output display.

summary.para: Sets the HDR metadata associated with the video stream.

param.name: pVideoProcessor
param.para: A pointer to the interface.

param.name: StreamIndex
param.para: Identifies the input stream.

param.name: Type
param.para: The type of HDR metadata supplied.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the HDR metadata supplied in pHDRMetaData.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, the size should be 0.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, the size is sizeof(DXGI_HDR_METADATA_HDR10).

param.name: pHDRMetaData
param.para: Pointer to the metadata information.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, this should be NULL.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, this is a pointer to a structure.

remarks.para: When processing an HDR stream, the driver may use this information to tone map the video content to optimize it for the output display.
